teacheasy.data

Class ImageObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.data.PageObject
      • teacheasy.data.ImageObject

  • public class ImageObject
extends PageObject
    Encapsulates the data that describes an Image Object as defined in the TeachEasy digital lesson XML format. Extends the page object supertype.
    Version:
    1.2 13 Feb 2015
    Author:
    Sam Raeburn, Sam Hall

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class teacheasy.data.PageObject

        PageObject.PageObjectType

      Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageObject

        public ImageObject(float nXStart,
           float nYStart,
           float nXEnd,
           float nYEnd,
           java.lang.String nSourcefile,
           float nXScaleFactor,
           float nYScaleFactor,
           float nRotation,
           float nStartTime,
           float nDuration)
        Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.
        Parameters:
        nXStart - Relative X axis start position.
        nYStart - Relative Y axis start position.
        nXEnd - Relative X axis end position.
        nYEnd - Relative Y axis end position.
        nSourcefile - Image file path.
        nXScaleFactor - X Scale as a proportion of image size.
        nYScaleFactor - Y Scale as a proportion of image size.
        nRotation - Rotation in degrees.
        nStartTime - Start time of object (not used).
        nDuration - End time of object (not used).
